languages.text: Whenewer wielder receives warp, energy, power or fire damage this sword absorbes wielders {uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % of that damage and wlelder receives additional penetration for next attack equal to {uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}. Stacks

traits.locale_text: Whenewer wielder receives warp, energy, power or fire damage this sword absorbes wielders {uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % of that damage and wlelder receives additional penetration for next attack equal to {uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}. Stacks

languages.text: Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage, reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж получает огненный, силовой, энергетический или варп-урон, этот меч поглощает часть урона, сокращая его на {uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. Персонаж получает +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% к пробитию брони при совершении следующей атаки этим мечом. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.

languages.text: Erleidet der Träger Energie-, Feuer- oder Warp-Schaden, absorbiert dieses Schwert einen Teil des Schadens und reduziert ihn um −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} %. Der Träger erhält für seinen nächsten Angriff +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % Rüstungsdurchdringung. Stapelbar.

languages.text: 保有者がエネルギー、火、パワー、<歪み>のダメージを受けるたび、この剣はそのダメージの一部を吸収し、-{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}％減少させる。保有者は、次の攻撃で+{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}％のアーマー貫通を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage, reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 保有者がエネルギー、火、パワー、<歪み>のダメージを受けるたび、この剣はそのダメージの一部を吸収し、-{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}％減少させる。保有者は、次の攻撃で+{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}％のアーマー貫通を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador sufre daño elemental, por fuego, de energía o de disformidad, esta espada absorbe parte de ese daño, reduciéndolo un −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} %. El portador gana +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % de penetración de armadura para su próximo ataque. Se acumula.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador sufre daño elemental, por fuego, de energía o de disformidad, esta espada absorbe parte de ese daño, reduciéndolo un −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} %. El portador gana +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % de penetración de armadura para su próximo ataque. Se acumula.

languages.text: 每当装备者受到能量、火焰、动力或亚空间伤害时，这把长剑都会吸收一部分伤害，使装备者承受的伤害降低{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%。此外，装备者下次攻击时，护甲穿透提高{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage, reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者受到能量、火焰、动力或亚空间伤害时，这把长剑都会吸收一部分伤害，使装备者承受的伤害降低{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%。此外，装备者下次攻击时，护甲穿透提高{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur subit des dégâts d'énergie, de feu, énergétiques ou du Warp, cette épée en absorbe une partie en les réduisant de −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} %. L'utilisateur gagne +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % de pénétration d'armure pour sa prochaine attaque. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage, reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.

L'utilisateur gagne +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} % de pénétration d'armure pour sa prochaine attaque. Cumulable.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi her enerji, ateş, güç veya öteboyut hasarına maruz kaldığında kılıç, bu hasarı kısmen emerek %{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} kadar azaltır. Kullanan kişi, bir sonraki saldırısı için +%{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b} kadar zırh delme değeri kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
